trans-unit.source: Provides functions to render a collection of categorized tools, as well as notify users about tool selection and creation events.
trans-unit.target: 提供一些功能，用于呈现已分类的工具的集合，以及向用户通知工具选择和创建事件。

trans-unit.source: This class is <see langword="sealed" />, so it cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类是 <see langword="sealed" />，因此不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: This class provides support for representing the toolbox controls when re-hosting the [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/includes/wfd1-md.md)] outside of Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于表示工具箱控件重新承载时提供支持[!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/includes/wfd1-md.md)]在 Visual Studio 之外。

trans-unit.source: It implements <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>.

The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl> contains a collection of toolbox categories that hold various categories of tools that can be accessed with the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.Categories%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl> 包含工具箱类别的集合，工具箱类别保存了各种类别的工具，可通过 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.Categories%2A> 属性进行访问。

trans-unit.source: It also is able to retrieve the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner> with which it is associated using the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.AssociatedDesigner%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 也可以使用 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner> 属性检索与其相关联的 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.AssociatedDesigner%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For activities to load properly in the toolbox, the assembly that contains the activities must be loaded first.
trans-unit.target: 对于能够正确加载工具箱中的活动，该程序集包含的活动必须加载第一次。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFrom%2A> to load the activity type if it is contained in a different assembly; using <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> instead will cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFrom%2A>从中加载该活动类型，如果它是包含在另一个程序集; 如果使用<xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>改为将导致异常引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/includes/wfd1-md.md)] with which this toolbox control is associated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此工具箱控件所关联的 [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/includes/wfd1-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.WorkflowDesigner" /> instance with which this toolbox control is associated.
trans-unit.target: 此工具箱控件所关联的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.WorkflowDesigner" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of toolbox categories associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此控件相关联的工具箱类别的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Design.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems" /> that contains the collection of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Design.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory" /> objects associated with this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含与此 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Design.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems" /> 相关联的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Design.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory" /> 对象的集合的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl" />。

trans-unit.source: If the value set is `null`, the categories in the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems> will be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置的值是`null`中的类别<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems>将被清除。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style used for each category item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于每个类别项的样式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> object that contains the style applied to each of the categories.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> 对象，包含应用于每个类别的样式。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.CategoryItemStyle" /> dependency property.
This field is read-only.
Gets or sets the data template used for the category.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于该类别的数据模板。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> for the category.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.CategoryTemplate" /> dependency property.
This field is read-only.
Builds the visual tree for this toolbox control.
trans-unit.target: 生成此工具箱控件的可视化树。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.OnApplyTemplate%2A> method is invoked by the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl> implements <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>, which, in turn, implements <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
Gets or sets the tool being selected in the toolbox.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置工具箱中选定的工具。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem" /> object selected.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.SelectedTool" /> dependency property.
This field is read-only.
Gets or sets the name of the toolbox file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置工具箱文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the toolbox file.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.ToolboxFile" /> dependency property.
This field is read-only.
Occurs when a tool is created in the toolbox control.
trans-unit.target: 在工具箱控件中创建工具时发生。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.ToolCreated" /> event.
This field is read-only.
Gets or sets the style used for the tool items.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于工具项的样式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> for the tool items.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.ToolItemStyle" /> dependency property.
This field is read-only.
Occurs when a tool is selected in the toolbox control.
trans-unit.target: 在工具箱控件中选择工具时发生。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.ToolSelected" /> event.
This field is read-only.
Gets or sets the data template used for the tools.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于工具的数据模板。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> used for the tools.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxControl.ToolTemplate" /> dependency property.
This field is read-only.
